docs.lead_paragraph: The former German star hopes to keep expectations low for the coming World Cup. For now, Klinsmann will take the long view when it comes to soccer success for the United States.

headline.main: How Jurgen Klinsmann Plans to Make U.S. Soccer Better (and Less American)

docs.abstract: Jurgen Klinsmann, former German soccer star and current coach of the United States national team, hopes to keep expectations low for the coming World Cup; Klinsmann believes he must take a long view of the team's prospects, grooming its current roster for future cups, and that he must get American soccer to mimic European soccer culture.
docs.snippet: The former German star hopes to keep expectations low for the coming World Cup. For now, Klinsmann will take the long view when it comes to soccer success for the United States.
